author: bergmeister
body:
@TravisEz13 @SteveL-MSFT 
When doing some testing of side by side installation of x86 and x64 I noticed another issue:
The start menu entry is not architecture specific as well, therefore when installing both x86 and x64, the second installation replaces the existing start menu folder and shortcut of the first one.
It is less severe than the recent fix of the upgrade code but it still affects GA.

Environment data
----------------

6.0.0.-rc.2
title: Windows installer: Start menu shortcuts are not architecture specific
